main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted on 2 Apr 52, approximately 6 miles SW of Lometa, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as orange-silver with a white bluish tail., It was reported as a cigar-shaped object with a large fireball in the area., The object appeared to maneuver from 300 degrees to 120 degrees before suddenly disappearing., The sighting was also tracked by radar., The source of the report was AP officers from a radar team.
